visa.q9.info.heading: What is the Opportunity Card?
visa.q9.info.text: The Opportunity Card (Chancenkarte) is a points-based job-seeking visa that allows you to come to Germany for up to 1 year to search for employment. You need at least 6 points based on qualifications, experience, language skills, and age.
visa.results.heading: Your Visa Assessment Results

visa.results.oc.congrats: Congratulations! You meet the minimum 6 points requirement.
visa.results.oc.more: more points to qualify for the Opportunity Card.
visa.results.oc.tip1: • Improve German language skills to B2+ level (+1 point)
visa.results.oc.tip2: • Gain more work experience (2-5 years: +1 point, 5+ years: +2 points)
visa.results.oc.tip4: • Apply before age 35 (+2 points) or before 40 (+1 point)

visa.results.financial.heading: Important: Financial Requirements
visa.results.financial.text: For the Opportunity Card, you must demonstrate financial resources of at least €1,091 per month through one of these options:
visa.results.financial.option1.heading: Blocked Bank Account:
visa.results.financial.option1.text: Deposit the full amount (€13,092 for 12 months) in a German blocked account
visa.results.financial.option2.heading: Declaration of Commitment:
visa.results.financial.option2.text: Have someone in Germany guarantee your financial support
visa.results.financial.option3.heading: Job Offer:
visa.results.financial.option3.text: Employment contract with monthly salary of at least €1,091
visa.results.nomatch.heading: No Immediate Visa Match
visa.results.nomatch.text: Based on your current situation, you don't meet the requirements for the main work visas. However, you have options:
visa.results.nomatch.option1: • Improve your German language skills to B2 level
visa.results.nomatch.option2: • Get your degree recognized through individual assessment
visa.results.nomatch.option3: • Gain more work experience in your field
visa.results.nomatch.option4: • Consider vocational training programs in Germany
visa.results.nomatch.cta: for personalized guidance on your path to Germany.
